title: Hula
description: From USA Today Bestselling author Leslie Pike  Alek returned to Hawaii for the summer to rescue the family business. He had three months to accomplish the task before heading back to California with his teenage daughter. He had a plan, and he was going to stick to it. But then fate threw him a surprise in the form of a gorgeous hula girl. He watched her dance. She watched the way his full lips moved when he smiled.They both had reasons not to pursue a relationship, but their undeniable chemistry couldnâ€™t be denied.Can their summer of love last forever?HULA is a standalone novel in the Coming Home series where each month a different author releases a new story about coming home.
author: Leslie Pike
